Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory307.png'}
{3: 'Your fight is over. Once Nanami realizes who she is fighting, she immediately stops.'}
{3: 'To your surprise, the small machines also flee without putting up a fight.'}
{3: 'Nobody notices, however, that during your chase, the tiny tracking device in the pocket of the jacket Watanabe gave you had fallen on the ground, lost without a trace.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'How comes I always run into you, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'And Karey deary! The little guy you brought...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "So it is! I've been hoping for a new friend, and you will do just fine! That's right!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "You might be a bit too cute and too loud, but... I'm sure we'll find something good about you!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hey! Don't you notice that we've just saved you? You were alone and surrounded by all those... maybe-Corrupted.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "If we weren't here, you could be in serious danger! Can't you act a bit more serious?!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "And stop trying to befriend my CUB! It's an expensive asset from Babylonia!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Wait a minute—wait! I think you got confused!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Huh? You're the one who's confused and not appreciating our help!", 4: '2'}
{3: "Karenina's famous temper reaches a boiling point, and her CUB responds to her rage by hovering overhead and circling over her."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Should we leave this place for now for safety?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I agree.', 3: '26', 4: "It's about time to return.", 5: '30'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Then let's move.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "We can't confirm if those small machines will fight back at this point. From what we've seen so far... their actions have been highly unusual.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Not so fast!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "We can't confirm if those small machines will fight back at this point. From what we've seen so far... their actions have been highly unusual.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'You mean how they retreated without a fight? Tsk, those tricky bastards really did annoy me...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'We acted hastily because we were worried about Nanami, but... those maybe-Corrupted were acting quite odd indeed.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Compared to the enemies we fought before... it's rare to find mechanoids that still retain their consciousness. And they were behaving so much less hostile than how Corrupted would act...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "If they can't be Corrupted... then, maybe they are... Awakened?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's why I said you got it confused!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'No biggy, but Nanami does know a thing or two about them—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'If only you would listen! That includes you, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm listening.", 3: '47', 4: 'What do you know about them?', 5: '47'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I was going to hunt them down, but Nanami's meticulous plan was disrupted by you guys!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hunt them down? Since when do you do that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I am Nanami the All-Capable!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: '...Are you capable of sharing some of your intel on them, then?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'If you want to know more about them—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "We'll trade! You can ask again after you help Nanami fixes your mistakes!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What do you want us to do?', 3: '59'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Simple! Help me catch them all!', 4: '1'}
